code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Assets.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Assets=()=>{const[totalCost,setTotalCost]=useState(0);const[totalQuantity,setTotalQuantity]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTotalCost=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/inventory/total-cost`);setTotalCost(res.data.totalCost);setTotalQuantity(res.data.totalQuantity);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchTotalCost();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"assets",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Assets Page"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-cost-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Total Inventory Cost"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\u20B9 ",totalCost.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-quantity-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Total Quantity"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:totalQuantity})]})]});};export default Assets;
